text: excited to announce the preview of our
new f1 instances which are FPGA
instances
so this f1 instances we have FPGAs
attach them they allow you to build and
write your own accelerations and then
deploy them to f1 instances so it allow
you to develop it gives you all the code
you need and all the tools you need to
develop stimulate test debug and compile
your code
there's a hardware development kit
available for you as well as an FPGA
image that we give you you can create
either if you built your own FPGA
acceleration yourself you can bring
those to these f1 instances or you can
create one with our tool kits you could
you package those into an FPGA instance
or an AFI and then you upload it to an
FPGA instance and you're ready to go
we're announcing the preview today in
the coming weeks when we make it
generally available if you're somebody
who has built a number of these FPGA
accelerations or want to build those we
will make them available in the AWS
marketplace for others to be able to
consume so we're very excited about what
this will allow you to do
